name: Jump Dog - Best Audio Control Game
name_original: Jump Dog - Best Audio Control Game
description:
Scream Jump Dog is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the dog.

Make a lot of noise to force the dog to run and jump or stay quiet to control the dog moves slowly.

Get your high score for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles!

How to play?

- Don't make any noise to make the dog stop
- Speak softly to make the dog walk
- Scream to make the dog jump

Features

- Move your dog with your voice.
- Awesome graphics and sound effects.
- Scream go and don't stop making your dog move.
- Talk or make small sounds to make your dog walk.

Let's begin to scream now and make your scream go dog!
